sections.name: welcome
sections.heading: Monstrously Cohesive Visual Systems
sections.caption: Why did the monster hire a designer? Because his branding was a real nightmare.

sections.name: product-info
sections.heading: Consistency Across All Monsters (and Tentacles)
sections.caption: Why don’t monsters ever need rebranding? Because their scary face is already their logo.

sections.name: product-features
sections.heading: Our AI is so smart, it corrected my spilling…
sections.caption: Finally, a feature that makes fewer mistakes than your other LLM.

cards.heading: Cloud-Powered Excuses
cards.content: Our AI can explain why your project is late—now with 99.9% uptime.

cards.heading: Infinite Buzzwords
cards.content: Synergy, blockchain, quantum—our system auto-generates jargon so you sound smart in meetings.

cards.heading: Predictive Coffee Runs
cards.content: Our algorithm knows when you need caffeine before you do. It’s basically a psychic barista.

cards.heading: AI-Powered Eye Rolls
cards.content: Detects bad design decisions instantly, then rolls its virtual eyes so you don’t have to.

cards.heading: Auto-Meme Generator
cards.content: Because sometimes the best way to explain ROI is with a cat picture.

cards.heading: Monster-Friendly UI
cards.content: Scales perfectly from tiny goblin thumbs to Godzilla-sized claws.

sections.name: customer-testimonials
sections.heading: What Our Clients Say
sections.caption: Because apparently our moms’ reviews don’t count
